title: IntroPage exact hex color updates (wine heading, unicorn silver body, thyme CTA)

requirements.summary: Set IntroPage main heading color to exact hex #722F37 using a Tailwind arbitrary color class (not theme tokens).
acceptanceCriteria: On the Intro page, the main heading renders in hex color #722F37.
The change is visible in the browser and is not dependent on existing theme tokens such as `text-wine`.

file_operations.description: Replace the heading text color class currently using a theme token (e.g., `text-wine`) with a Tailwind arbitrary value class that renders exactly #722F37 (e.g., `text-[#722F37]`). Ensure no copy/content changes.

requirements.summary: Set IntroPage body paragraph color to exact hex #E8E8E8 using a Tailwind arbitrary color class (not theme tokens).
acceptanceCriteria: On the Intro page, the main paragraph renders in hex color #E8E8E8.
The paragraph remains readable against the background and the color change is visible in the browser.

file_operations.description: Replace the paragraph text color class currently using a theme token (e.g., `text-unicorn-silver`) with a Tailwind arbitrary value class that renders exactly #E8E8E8 (e.g., `text-[#E8E8E8]`). Ensure no copy/content changes.

requirements.summary: Update IntroPage CTA box background to use exact hex #669966 while preserving existing opacity/alpha and hover/transition behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Intro page, the clickable CTA box (that navigates to the proposal page) has a background color based on hex #669966.
The CTA box still navigates to the next page when clicked.
Hover/transition behavior remains present after the color update.

file_operations.description: Update the CTA container background class from the current theme token with opacity (e.g., `bg-thyme/80`) to a Tailwind arbitrary hex background with the same opacity (e.g., `bg-[#669966]/80`) so the alpha behavior is preserved. Do not alter the CTA click handler, navigation, or existing transition/hover classes.
